attributes.action: TELL US HOW MUCH THE SYRIA CONFERENCE COST US - we have every confidence that David Cameron volunteered OUR TAXPAYER POUNDS.
attributes.additional_details: And, of course, to ensure they all stay at the most expensive hotels and restaurants on the planet, WITH NO RESTRICTIONS upon what they use our taxpayer pounds to buy.  Something we taxpayers are fast becoming used to under our own corrupt political regime - the most dangerous political regime on the planet.  No other government currently gives more money to fund worldwide terrorism (more than Russia and Iran) than the one headed by David Cameron and we continue to do nothing to stop him!
